daily.title: Daily
daily.headerStartDate: The time chosen is in accordance with the car rental time (WITA)
daily.footerStartDate: When selecting rental hours will be the same as Return hours

getrideDescription.title: What is Get & Ride?
getrideDescription.description: Get & Ride is an online application that provides car rental and rental services with a driver or off key specifically for the Bali area. We provide various types of cars at affordable prices. Immediately submit a business trip, vacation, or private event to us.

destinationFavList.name: Tirta Gangga Water Palace in Bali
destinationFavList.description: The name Tirta Gangga itself comes from the word Tirta which means water, and Gangga which means the name of a river in India. The flowing water is also believed to be holy water and can wash away bad energy. You can also feed the Koi fishes around and swim here. Don't forget to pack a change of clothes!

destinationFavList.name: Ulun Danu Batur Temple in Kintamani
destinationFavList.description: Ulun Danu Batur Temple is one of the most iconic spots that offers a beautiful panorama, since it is located above Lake Batur with Mount Batur as a background. The air temperature is also very cool and fresh, which is perfect for you who want to refresh or calm your mind.

destinationFavList.name: Melasti Beach Ungasan
destinationFavList.description: In a list of the best beaches on Bali, Melasti Beach cannot be missing! This beach is much admired by tourists for its beautiful sea views and cleanliness. The waves on this beach are not too big and safe for those of you who want to play in the water or swim.

destinationFavList.name: Kanto Lampo Waterfall, Ubud
destinationFavList.description: Waterfalls are usually found around forests or mountains, uniquely, Kanto Lampo is located near the residential area of Gianyar, Bali. The waterfall does not flow directly into the river, but passes through the rocks which creates a beautiful and cool atmosphere because of the splashing water around it.

carFavList.title: Toyota Veloz
carFavList.description: This Toyota Veloz type has been in great demand before it was launched. The newest design looks cooler and more modern and the capacity can also reach up to 7 passengers! You and your family will definitely be comfortable during the holidays

carFavList.title: Suzuki Ertiga Gx
carFavList.description: The Suzuki Ertiga Gx car type can also be an option for traveling around the island of Bali. Apart from the large passenger capacity, the security features are also pretty good. Your vacation is guaranteed to be safer & calmer!

carFavList.title: Toyota Hiace Premio
carFavList.description: If you want a relaxing, comfortable, and large-capacity vacation, you can immediately choose the Toyota Hiace Premio. The cabin design is spacious, it will reduce the feeling of aches and fatigue during trips around the city.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Rent a Car at Get&Ride

list_1.subtitle: Time-saving
list_1.description: Hire a car online, anywhere and anytime. Choose your schedule and car type easily and reliably at Get & Ride.

list_2.subtitle: Competitive Price
list_2.description: Don't worry! Get & Ride's rental prices are affordable and guaranteed to be competitive.

list_3.subtitle: Best Cars
list_3.description: Get & Ride provides the best quality and cleanest cars. All cars are serviced regularly for convenience.

list_4.subtitle: Best Services
list_4.description: Providing professional drivers, implementation of health protocols, and vehicle protection. All cars at Get & Ride are covered by insurance.

withDriver.description_1: If you select the car rental "With Driver" then you will be redirected to Whatsapp
withDriver.description_2: Once you have selected the time and date, you will select an available car and driver.
withDriver.description_3: Once you have selected a car, you will receive an invoice for your car rental.

carDetail.rentalTime: Use up to 24 hours per rental day
carDetail.agreeState: I agree to the terms that apply

policies.list_1: The duration of car rental per day is 24 hours
policies.list_2: Overtime fee per hour 10% of the rental price
policies.list_4: Not including fuel, parking, toll and driver

sebelum_pengambilan.title: Before Rental
sebelum_pengambilan.list_1: Renters must share with the provider a photo of their driver's license (SIM A or International SIM), as well as their ID Card (KTP or Passport).
sebelum_pengambilan.list_2: Renters must pay a deposit of IDR 500,000 to the provider before the rental start, with the available payment methods.
sebelum_pengambilan.list_3: The deposit will be returned at the latest 7 days after the rental ends.

saat_pengambilan.title: During Pick-Up
saat_pengambilan.list_1: Renters are required to show a valid driver's license and ID card (KTP or Passport and SIM A or International SIM)
saat_pengambilan.list_2: Renters must be over 17 years old.
saat_pengambilan.list_3: All documents provided must be original, not in the name of another person, and in accordance with the data registered when ordering at Get & Ride Apps.
saat_pengambilan.list_4: Renters must ensure that the rented vehicle is properly used and returned in the same condition as it was originally.

penggunaan.title: Rental Policies Usage
penggunaan.list_1: Vehicles are not allowed to be transferred to other parties who are not verified by Get & Ride data. Get & Ride parties can forcefully take the vehicle if the following indications occur.
penggunaan.list_2: Renters will be charged an additional fee, if the pick-up and return outside the available zone
penggunaan.list_3: Renters are allowed to bring pets in certain cars. Make sure pets don't damage or contaminate the vehicle facilities in the car.
penggunaan.list_4: Renters are not allowed to carry passengers or luggage that exceeds the capacity of the car being rented.
penggunaan.list_5: Renters are responsible for replacement or repair costs in the event of loss or damage to Vehicle Registration Cerfticicate (STNK), car keys, accessories, car tools, head units, tools sets, scratches, stains, and other costs arising from the renters.
penggunaan.list_6: Renters are responsible for all parking, traffic and other fines incurred as a result of violations of law during the rental.

pengembalian.title: After Rental Policy
pengembalian.list_1: The provider has the right not to return the deposit, if the car is damaged or if the tenant violates the law during the rental period.
pengembalian.list_2: The provider is not responsible for items left in the car after the renter returns the car to the rental provider.
pengembalian.list_3: The renter must return the car with the same volume of fuel as the car was received (bar to bar)
pengembalian.list_4: If there is an electronic traffic ticket during the rental period, the rental provider will return the deposit by deducting the fine of the electronic ticket.
pengembalian.list_5: Get & Ride is not responsible for accidents, losses, and treatment caused by the accident.

overtime.title: Overtime
overtime.list_1: An overtime fee will be charged if the rental exceeds 24 hours per day.
overtime.list_2: Renters are given an additional 1 (one) hour of compensation time, and if it is exceeded, the tenant will be charged 10% per hour of the rental price, with a maximum limit of 4 (four) hours.
overtime.list_3: Overtime of more than 4 hours, will be charged a one-day rental fee.

asuransi.title: Asuransi (belum ready)
asuransi.list_1: Jika terjadi kecelakaan, penyewa diwajibkan untuk menyerahkan kepada penyedia semua dokumen yang dibutuhkan oleh perusahan asuransi, termasuk namun tidak terbatas pada KTP/paspor dan SIM A mereka.
asuransi.list_2: Penyewa wajib menanggung beban biaya Risiko Sendiri sebesar Rp350.000 untuk setiap kejadian kecelakan (per panel).
asuransi.list_3: Penyewa wajib menanggung Biaya Risiko Kehilangan (Total Lost Risk) sebesar Rp500.000 jika mobil hilang.
asuransi.list_4: Perselisihan antara pihak akan diselesaikan via musyawarah mufakat. Jika dalam waktu 30 hari para pihak belum mencapai mufakat, masalah akan diselesaikan di Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Utara.

refund.title: Refund & Cancellation Policy
refund.list_1: Cancellations submitted more than 24 hours prior to pick-up will receive a 100% refund of the total rental fee.
refund.list_2: If the cancellation is submitted within 24 to 6 hours before the pick up time, a 50% refund of the total rental fee will be received
refund.list_3: Cancellation submitted less than 6 hours before the pick-up time will incur a cancellation fee of 100% of the total rental fee.
refund.list_4: The refund process does not apply to promo rental prices and certain types of vehicles.
refund.list_5: Refunds are processed up to 14 working days after the refund process has been approved

bca.title: Transfer via ATM
steps: Insert the ATM card and enter ATM BCA PIN
Select Cash Withdrawal/Other Transactions
Select Other Transactions
Select Transfer
Select To BCA Virtual Account
Enter the BCA Virtual Account number,  78749222178 and click Correct
Check the transaction details and select Yes
Transaction is successful

bca.title: Transfer via Mobile Banking
steps: Open BCA mobile, select m-Transfer
Select BCA Virtual Account
Enter the BCA Virtual Account number, 78749222178 and click Send
Check the amount that shows
Enter m-BCA PIN
Transaction is successful

bca.title: Transfer via Klik BCA
steps: Login to KlikBCA and select Fund Transfer
Select Transfer to BCA Virtual Account
Enter the BCA Virtual Account number, 78749222178 and click Continue
Enter the KeyBCA Appli 1 response and click Send
Transaction is successful

mandiri.title: Transfer via ATM
steps: Enter your ATM PIN.
On the main menu, select “Pay / Buy”.
Select "Other" until you find the "Multipayment" menu.
Enter the company code with the number: “70012” (without quotes) a / n Midtrans. After that, select "Correct".
Enter your payment code, then select "Correct".
Re-check your transaction after that complete the payment process.

mandiri.title: Transfer via Mobile Banking
steps: Log in to Mandiri Livin' or Mandiri Internet Banking.
On the main menu, select “Pay”.
Select “Make New Payment”.
After that, select the “Multipayment” menu.
Enter the company code with the number: “70012” (without quotes) a / n Midtrans. After that select "True".
Enter your payment code, then select "Correct".
Re-check your transaction after that complete the payment process.

permata.title: Transfer via ATM
steps: Enter your ATM PIN.
On the main menu, select Other Transactions.
Select the Payment menu.
Choose Other Payment.
Select Virtual Account.
Enter the Virtual Account number: 787007381079144.
The amount to be paid and the account number will appear on the payment confirmation page. If the information is correct, select True.

permata.title: Transfer via Mobile Banking
steps: Open the Permata Mobile app.
Enter User ID & Password.
Choose Pay Bill.
Select Virtual Account.
Enter the Virtual Account Number: 787007381079144.
Enter the payment amount.
Payment confirmation appears.
Enter Mobile PIN.
Transaction complete.

bni.title: Transfer via ATM
steps: Enter your ATM and BNI PIN.
On the main menu, select “Other Menu”.
Select "Transfer"
After that, select "Savings Account".
Select "BNI Account".
Enter the Virtual Account number 9887874930099369
Enter the payment amount according to the invoice.
Check your transaction again, then select "Yes".

bni.title: Transfer via Mobile Banking
steps: Enter the BNI Mobile Banking application.
Enter User ID and Password.
Select the "Transfer" menu.
After that, select “Between BNI Accounts”.
Select "Input New Account".
Enter the Virtual Account number 9887874930099369
Check your transaction again, then select "Yes".
Enter the password to confirm payment.

bri.title: Transfer via ATM
steps: Enter your ATM Card and BRI PIN.
On the main menu, select the menu "Other Transactions"
Select the "Payment" menu
Select the "More" menu
Select the “BRIVA” menu
Enter the BRIVA (Virtual Account) number “9887874930099369” and click Correct
On the confirmation page, make sure the transaction data is correct then select "Yes"
Transaction completed

bri.title: Transfer via Mobile Banking
steps: Enter the BRI Mobile Banking application
Select “BRI Mobile Banking”
Select the "Info" menu
Select the “BRIVA” menu
Enter BRIVA number 9887874930099369 and click correct
Enter the payment amount according to the invoice
Enter your PIN
The transaction is successful
Enter the card holder name, card number, validity period and also your CVV code in the form provided, make sure the number entered is valid and not written incorrectly.
Then verify your Debit Card by pressing the "Process Payment" button. After the Debit Card is verified, you can continue the payment.
After payment is successful and verified, your order status will be successful and your transaction will be comfortable and safe.

gopay.title: Payment instructions via QR Code
steps: Click pay using GoPay.
Select Continue Payment. Then a QR code will appear.
Or open an application that can use QRIS, installed on your cellphone, such as Gojek
Click Pay and Scan the QR code.
Check Payment detail then click Pay
Enter you Gopay PIN
Transaction Completed

gopay.title: Instruksi pembayaran Aplikasi Gojek
steps: Make sure you have a Gojek account on your cellphone
Choose payment using GoPay
Click Continue Payment, then choose Continue
Click Continue to the Gojek Application, you will be directed to the Gojek application
Check payment details then click Pay
Enter Gopay PIN
Transaction completed

bca.title: Transfer via ATM
steps: Insert ATM Card and ATM PIN
Select the Cash Withdrawal/Other Transactions menu
Select the Other Transactions menu
Select the Transfer menu
Enter the BCA Get & Ride account number, 5205979988 a/n. PT ITC and click Correct
Enter the Enter the amount of money that must be transferred through BCA ATMs
If all processes are complete and correct, select "Yes" (Don't forget to screenshot proof of transfer)
After the transfer is successful, open Payment Confirmation on the website / application
Enter the Sender's name and upload Proof of Transfer
Click Confirm Transfer
Payment will be checked

bca.title: Transfer via Mobile Banking
steps: Open the Mobile Banking Application, select the m-Transfer menu
Click the Transfer List menu
Select the menu Between Accounts (for BCA users) and Interbank (for users other than BCA)
Enter the BCA Get & Ride account number, 5205979988 a/n. PT Indo Teknologi Cemerlang and click Correct
Enter the amount of money that must be transferred via ATM BCA
Enter your PIN
If all processes have been completed and are correct, select "Yes" (Don't forget to screenshot proof of transfer)
After the transfer is successful, open Payment Confirmation on the website / application
Enter the Sender's name and upload Proof of Transfer
Click Confirm Transfer
Payment will be checked

mandiri.title: Transfer via ATM
steps: Insert ATM Card and ATM PIN
Select the Cash Withdrawal/Other Transactions menu
Select the Other Transactions menu
Select the Transfer menu
Enter the MANDIRI Get & Ride account number, 5205979988 a/n. PT ITC and click Correct
Enter the Enter the amount of money that must be transferred through MANDIRI ATMs
If all processes are complete and correct, select "Yes" (Don't forget to screenshot proof of transfer)
After the transfer is successful, open Payment Confirmation on the website / application
Enter the Sender's name and upload Proof of Transfer
Click Confirm Transfer
Payment will be checked

mandiri.title: Transfer via Mobile Banking
steps: Open the Mobile Banking Application, select the m-Transfer menu
Click the Transfer List menu
Select the menu Between Accounts (for MANDIRI users) and Interbank (for users other than MANDIRI)
Enter the MANDIRI Get & Ride account number, 5205979988 a/n. PT Indo Teknologi Cemerlang and click Correct
Enter the amount of money that must be transferred via ATM MANDIRI
Enter your PIN
If all processes have been completed and are correct, select "Yes" (Don't forget to screenshot proof of transfer)
After the transfer is successful, open Payment Confirmation on the website / application
Enter the Sender's name and upload Proof of Transfer
Click Confirm Transfer
Payment will be checked
